Title: The Lion King
Plot: A lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father’s death.

Title: Titanic
Plot: A love story unfolds aboard the ill-fated Titanic, ending in tragedy as the ship sinks.

Title: Inception
Plot: A skilled thief is given the task of planting an idea into someone’s mind through dream manipulation.

Title: Avengers
Plot: A group of superheroes unite to save Earth from a global alien threat.

Title: Interstellar
Plot: A team travels through a wormhole in search of a new habitable planet for humanity.

Title: The Matrix
Plot: A hacker discovers reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion to fight the system.

Title: Joker
Plot: A mentally troubled comedian descends into madness and becomes a symbol of chaos.

Title: Parasite
Plot: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household and infiltrate their lives.

Title: Forrest Gump
Plot: A man with a low IQ recounts his extraordinary life journey through key historical events.

Title: Frozen
Plot: A princess sets off on a journey to find her sister, whose icy powers have trapped their kingdom in eternal winter.
